tasks.title: MATH221 — Apply weekly module template (W01–W15)
tasks.description: Ensure each week has Overview, Read/Watch, Practice, Homework, Quiz, Discussion, Links.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Re-link LTI tools to Fall 2025 sections
tasks.description: Reauthenticate and point LTI links (MOM/publisher/Perusall/etc.) to 2025 courses.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Prepare Ultra shell (nav, tools, entry point)
tasks.description: Configure course name, banner, availability=private, left-nav pruning, entry point.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Copy content from prior term
tasks.description: Copy items, modules, assessments, pools, rubrics, groups, gradebook cats, LTI links.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Update/clarify item descriptions
tasks.description: Refresh instructions, readings, links; ensure consistent voice and learning outcomes.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Align homework open/due/late windows
tasks.description: Set windows in the homework system to mirror Ultra dates; tolerances/randomization OK.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Quiz/Test settings & pools
tasks.description: Pools mapped; random blocks; time limits; attempts; feedback timing; prevent backtracking (if used).

tasks.title: MATH221 — Gradebook categories/weights/schemas
tasks.description: Categories, weights (sum=100% or points plan), calc columns, EC items placed correctly.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Ally & accessibility pass
tasks.description: Fix Ally issues; captions/transcripts; headings/tables/alt text; color contrast.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Student Preview end-to-end test
tasks.description: Navigate Week 0–2, submit samples, verify dates/time zone, gradebook visibility, all links.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Preflight (sources, policies, calendar)
tasks.description: Pick master source shell(s), export/archive prior term, confirm Fall 2025 milestones, and lock naming conventions.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Generate syllabus & schedule (toolchain)
tasks.description: Build PDF/HTML/DOCX via your Jinja/JSON pipeline; store artifacts and link in course.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Review syllabus & policies
tasks.description: Proofread, check policy language, accessibility, and all term dates.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Verify calendar milestones
tasks.description: Verify institutional holidays, campus closures, exam windows against your schedule.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Batch edit all due/release dates
tasks.description: Use Ultra Batch Edit to shift dates; spot-check edge cases (late windows, time zone AK).

tasks.title: MATH221 — Search/replace date text in item bodies
tasks.description: Replace old term strings (e.g., "Spring 2024") and hardcoded dates in descriptions/pages.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Proctoring config (if used)
tasks.description: LockDown/Respondus settings; create practice test; document requirements for students.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Accommodations & exceptions
tasks.description: Enter ADA letters; set test exceptions/extra time and verify per assessment.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Verify LTI grade sync
tasks.description: Post test assignment → confirm grades flow into the correct Gradebook categories.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Gradebook QA (totals, visibility, release)
tasks.description: Totals math, schema cutoffs, posting policy, student visibility; fix anomalies.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Build announcement templates
tasks.description: Welcome, weekly cadence (Mon "This week", Fri "Looking ahead"), exam reminders.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Schedule/queue announcements
tasks.description: Schedule welcome + Week 1 announcements; draft Week 2–3; confirm student notifications.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Groups (projects/labs) & tool access
tasks.description: Create group sets; assign or enable self-enroll with caps; attach tools/rubrics.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Ready for student access
tasks.description: Aggregation task signaling the course is fully prepared for students. Blocks publishing/go-live tasks. Auto-unblocks when all prerequisites are done.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Open course & set availability
tasks.description: Set course availability to students; final smoke check immediately after opening.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Roster & roles
tasks.description: Verify roster sync; Instructor/TA/Grader roles correct; attendance tool as needed.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Navigation & UX polish
tasks.description: Minimal left nav; consistent module names; mobile preview; clean link text; icons sparingly.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Enable Week 01 & office hours link
tasks.description: Release Week 01, confirm dates, post "This Week" announcement.

tasks.title: MATH221 — Draft Week 02 announcement & checks
tasks.description: Draft next week's announcement; verify upcoming windows and accommodations.
